page.title: 12Public Houses
page.content: One of the local pubs in Worle is the Woodspring.The times they open are 10:45am until 2:30pm then from 6:00pm to 11:00pm.The busiest time of the day is lunch time.The quietest time of the day is opening time.People like to eat out more nowadays.Most peoples' favourite drink is beer;the least favourite drink is Dark Rum.People don't go as often as they used to and when they do they like to eat out in nice surroundings.Most people nowadays like to play skittles,darts,card games and dominoes rather than electronic games.Men go alone more and they spend the most money on pay day.The landlord and landlady work 10+hours a day 7 days a week.They have lived at this pub for 10 years and have noticed the village has expanded to almost a small town.
